ARABIC: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Who has no partner. I am commanded to be like that and I am the first of the Muslims.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: No equal has He, I am commanded (to declare), and that I am the first to submit."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He has no associate. Thus have I been bidden, and I am the foremost of those who submit themselves (to Allah).`
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Nothing is equal to Him. Thus are the commandments which I have received and he is the first Muslim (submitted to the will of God)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “He has no partner; this is what I have been commanded, and I am the first Muslim.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: No associate has He; and this am I commanded, and I am the first of those who submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No associate has He. Even so I have been commanded, and I am the first of those that surrender.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He hath no partner. This am I commanded, and I am first of those who surrender (unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He has no partner. So am I commanded, and I am the first of those who submit."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: No associate hath He. And to this I am bidden, and I am the first of the Muslims.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He has no partner, and I have been commanded [to follow] this [creed], and I am the first of those who submit [to Allah].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: No partner hath He: this am I commanded, and I am the first of those who bow to His will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He has no partner, with that I am commanded, and I am the first of the submitters (Muslims)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No associate has He. Thus I am commanded, and I am the first of those who submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: No partner has He. And this I have been commanded, and I am the first [among you] of the Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:163] No associate has He, in these things. And to this, affirmation of the Oneness [of God], I have been commanded, and I am the first of those who submit’, from among this community.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He hath no partner. This am I commanded, and I am first of those who surrender (unto Him)) I am the first of those who sincerely worship Him and confess His divine Oneness.
